typo
Add OpenPOWER tag.
Done
Done
Is this logic is going to work MPIPL boot ( before completion) -> another MPIPL Request use case?
Another MPIPL from user is not allowed until host reach standby/running.
refering mpipl by phyp , double fault kind of usecase.

That is mostly like a system initiated MPIPL before notify followed by user initiated MPIPL, in such case the inprogress user initiated MPIPL will get updated after the second MPIPL, I think that is a very rare case.

Anyway two back to back user initiated MPIPLs are covered
Double fault is not impacted, since the entry is not created for system(PHYP) initiated MPIPLs
Ack
All looks good
srcDumpId local variable is removed but it is used here?
Done
we are using status() here and above we are using offloadUri().empty() to check if offload is in progress, do we need to modify line 40 too? just clarification

status says dump creation is in progress or not
offloadURI indicate an offload is in progress
